app.name: AI StockAlert
app.description: AI StockAlert: Stock price monitoring with Windows notifications

profile.cell_help: Required for WhatsApp alerts (include country code)

help.title: Help & Tips
help.getting_started_content:
AI StockAlert monitors your selected stocks in real-time and sends alerts via Windows notifications and WhatsApp when prices cross your defined thresholds.

1. Enter your Finnhub API key in Settings (get free at finnhub.io)
2. Add stocks to monitor in the Tickers tab
3. Set high and low price thresholds for each stock
4. Configure your alert channels (Windows, WhatsApp)
5. Enable the Background Service in Settings to receive alerts 24/7
help.settings_tips_content:
• API Key: Get your free Finnhub API key at finnhub.io/dashboard. Required for stock data.

• Check Interval: How often the app fetches new prices. Free tier minimum is 90 seconds.

• Cooldown Period: Prevents repeated alerts for the same stock. After an alert fires, you won't get another for that stock until the cooldown expires. Recommended: 5-15 minutes.

• Alert Channels: Choose Windows notifications and/or WhatsApp. Use the Test buttons to verify they work.
help.tickers_content:
• Add Ticker: Enter the stock symbol (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL) and set your price thresholds.

• High Threshold: You'll be alerted when the price rises ABOVE this value.

• Low Threshold: You'll be alerted when the price falls BELOW this value.

• Toggle Enabled: Temporarily disable monitoring for a stock without deleting it.

• Free Tier Limit: Up to 15 tickers can be monitored.
help.alerts_content:
• Windows Alerts: Appear as notifications in the bottom-right corner. Click to open a price chart.

• WhatsApp Alerts: Requires your phone number in the Profile tab and Twilio configuration.

• The app respects market hours - alerts only fire during US market hours (9:30 AM - 4:00 PM ET, Mon-Fri).
help.service_content:
• The Background Service allows StockAlert to monitor prices and send alerts even when the GUI is closed.

• Go to Settings > Background Service and click 'Start Service' to enable it.

• The service runs silently in the background until you stop it or restart your computer.

• Your settings and ticker configuration are automatically picked up by the service when you save changes.

1. Get your free API key from finnhub.io/dashboard
2. Paste your API key into the field above

settings.service_auto_help: StockAlert automatically monitors your stocks in the background. You can close this window and continue receiving alerts.
settings.autostart_help: Automatically start monitoring when Windows starts (recommended)

about.title: About StockAlert
about.description: Real-time stock price monitoring with smart alerts
about.author: Created by Robert Cushman

onboarding.title: Welcome to StockAlert!
onboarding.subtitle: Let's get you set up in 3 easy steps:
onboarding.step1_desc: Add your name, email, and phone number to receive personalized alerts via email and WhatsApp.
onboarding.step2_desc: Get a free Finnhub API key at finnhub.io/register and enter it in Settings. This enables real-time stock data.
onboarding.step3_desc: Go to the Tickers tab and add stocks you want to track. Set high/low price thresholds to trigger alerts.
onboarding.tip_desc: Enable 'Start with Windows' in Settings to receive alerts automatically when your computer starts!
